languages.text: В следующем космобою {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} и наносимый урон от Лансы и Макропушек снижены на 15%

traits.locale_text: В следующем космобою {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} и наносимый урон от Лансы и Макропушек снижены на 15%

languages.text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, your {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} damage, and your {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} damage will be reduced by −15%.
languages.original_text: В следующем бою {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}уклонение{/g} вашего {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g}, а также урон от {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучателей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушек{/g} будут уменьшены на 15%.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak geminin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değeri, {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}mızrak silahı{/g} hasarın ve {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro top{/g} hasarın %15 azalır.

languages.text: Durante el próximo combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Esquiva{/g}, el daño de las {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g} y el daño de los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se reducirán en un −15 %.

traits.locale_text: Durante el próximo combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Esquiva{/g}, el daño de las {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g} y el daño de los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} se reducirán en un −15 %.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}武器伤害降低15%。

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}伤害、{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}武器伤害降低15%。

languages.text: Im nächsten Kampf werden das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} deines {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} sowie der Schaden deiner {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffe{/g} und deiner {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makrokanone{/g} um –15 % verringert.
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, your {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} damage, and your {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} damage will be reduced by −15%.

traits.locale_text: Im nächsten Kampf werden das {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} deines {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} sowie der Schaden deiner {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffe{/g} und deiner {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makrokanone{/g} um –15 % verringert.

languages.text: Au cours du prochain combat, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g}, ainsi que les dégâts de la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} et du {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canon{/g} de votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} seront réduits de -15 %.
languages.original_text: During the next combat, your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}, your {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} damage, and your {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannon{/g} damage will be reduced by −15%.

traits.locale_text: Au cours du prochain combat, l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évitement{/g}, ainsi que les dégâts de la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} et du {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canon{/g} de votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} seront réduits de -15 %.

languages.text: 次の戦闘で、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}ダメージ、{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}ダメージは-15%低下する。
